title: A/C.3/80/L.3/Rev.1
text:
United Nations 
A/C.3/80/L.57 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
12 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-18382 (E)    181125 
*2518382* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 107 
Crime prevention and criminal justice 
 
 
 
 
 
United States of America: amendment to revised draft resolution 
A/C.3/80/L.3/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 Strengthening the United Nations crime prevention and criminal 
justice programme, in particular its technical cooperation capacity 
 
 
1. 
In operative paragraph 64, after “to strengthen their efforts in preventing” insert 
“and combating child pornography”. 
2. 
In operative paragraph 65, after “once in force” insert “, and emphasizes that 
the new convention must be implemented in a way that does not undermine the 
obligations of States contained in the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the 
Rights of the Child on the sale of children, child prostitution and child pornography”.

paragraphs.1: In operative paragraph 64, after “to strengthen their efforts in preventing” insert “and combating child pornography”.
paragraphs.2: In operative paragraph 65, after “once in force” insert “, and emphasizes that the new convention must be implemented in a way that does not undermine the obligations of States contained in the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the sale of children, child prostitution and child pornography”.
